General.Name: Galway Metals Inc.
General.Description: Galway Metals Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral resource properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for gold, zinc, copper, silver, and lead deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Clarence Stream project located in southwest New Brunswick, Canada; and Estrades mine, related Newiska concessions, and adjacent Casa Berardi claims located in western Quebec, Canada. Galway Metals Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
